titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records FA1603

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:55:18 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records are arranged in the following open series:

p.extref: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Advance Office, Series 1 (FA781)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Richard Allison, Series 2 (FA377)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Central Files, Series 3 (FA378)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, National Commission on Water Quality, Series 9 (FA379)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, New York Office, Series 10 (FA380)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Joseph E. Persico, Series 12 (FA381)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Press Releases, Series 13 (FA382)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Secretariat, Weekly Briefing Notes, Series 14 (FA261)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Speeches, Series 15 (FA383)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Working Papers of the Vice President, Series 18 (FA384)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential Records, Foreign Affairs and National Security, Series 19 (FA385)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection pertains specifically to Nelson A. Rockefeller's activities as Vice President, and that of his staff and associated offices.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: President Gerald R. Ford nominated Nelson A. Rockefeller to fill the vacant office of Vice President following the resignation of President Richard M. Nixon in August 1974. Rockefeller served as Vice President from December 19, 1974, to January 20, 1977.
